暬字的基本解释

暬
xiè
古同“亵”，不庄重地亲近；轻慢。

暬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》私列切，入薛，心。］
亲近。

暬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页499第16
【唐韻】【集韻】私列切【正韻】先結切，?音薛。【說文】日狎習相慢也。【詩·小雅】曾我暬御。【傳】暬御，侍御也。【五經文字】與褻同。　又【類篇】一曰瞑晦也。　又【集韻】諾叶切，音捻。義同。

暬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
暬字的起名意思

暂无。

暬
Basic explanation of words
暬
xiè
The ancients were "scene", approaching without dignity; contemptuous.
暬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" private column cut, enter Xue, heart. ]
Get close.
暬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　暬; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 499-16
[Tang Yun] [Jiyun] Private column cut [Zheng Yun] knot and cut first,? Yin Xue. [Said the text] The daily life is also slow. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Zeng Wo Zhuan Yu. [Biography] Yu Yu, Shi Yu also. 【Texts of the Five Classics】Same as Xie.　[Classes] Again, I said, "Liuhui also."　[Jiyun] Noye cut, sound twisted. The same meaning.

гл.

2) фамильярничать; унижать
